publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5036 Marlyn Glen: ARCH Success—That the Parliament congratulates the Association of Residents of Cliffburn and Hayshead (ARCH) in Arbroath on the award of £1,000 in this year’s Standing Up To Antisocial Behaviour Awards, for its continued work in tackling antisocial behaviour; applauds the association on its sustained and successful efforts to restore respect and pride in the community, and recognises its work as a fine example of communities working together that will set a worthy example for others in Scotland to follow.

S2M-5036 Marlyn Glen: ARCH Success—That the Parliament congratulates the Association of Residents of Cliffburn and Hayshead (ARCH) in Arbroath on the award of £1,000 in this year’s Standing Up To Antisocial Behaviour Awards, for its continued work in tackling antisocial behaviour; applauds the association on its sustained and successful efforts to restore respect and pride in the community, and recognises its work as a fine example of communities working together that will set a worthy example for others in Scotland to follow.
